document_data.mainbody:
Halacar Olósynne was the fifth king of the Olósynne Dynasty who ruled the nation of Aglarond.
Halacar inherited the throne when his mother, Ulae Olósynne, died in the . He only ruled for a few years until he was slain by agents of Thay in the .
Halacars younger sister was Ilione.
